FuncDef: The display dhcp snooping white-list statistics command displays statistics about packets matching a DHCP snooping whitelist rule.
CLIs: display dhcp snooping white-list [ rule-id <rule-id> ] [ slot <slot-id> ] statistics

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a whitelist rule.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 1024.

Specifies the slot ID of a board.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display dhcp snooping white-list slot 1 statistics
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before running the display command to check statistics about packets matching a DHCP snooping whitelist rule, run the reset command to clear existing statistics.
